mapper.insert: INSERT INTO time_tables (user_id, semester_id, title, is_public, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{semesterId}, #{title}, #{isPublic}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM time_tables t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.id WHERE u.university_id = #{universityId} AND t.is_public = TRUE ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
